issue.title: [Gandiva][C++] Add binary functions
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16527](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16527). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Implement binary functions in Gandiva side based on [Hive implementation](https://github.com/apache/hive/blob/master/ql/src/java/org/apache/hadoop/hive/ql/udf/generic/GenericUDFToBinary.java).

comments.body:
